entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
